basics.name: Nupur Kapoor
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: An ambitious developer with proven track record of finding the most effective technology solutions and meet clientâ€™s expectations. Well-organized, communicable, inquisitive and self-learner. Understands both user expectations and has the passion to transform ideas into products. Software Developer, Social Activist, Folk Dancer, Co-Founder of Women Who Code DC.

work.summary: Full stack web developer responsible for building responsive websites, extend existing sites and online campaign applications either in a team environment or independently
highlights: Day to day work involves working with PHP, Blackbaud API, JavaScript, MySQL and MongoDB to redesign and architect responsive websites.
Cross platform mobile application development, for iOS and Android, using PhoneGap, node.js, MongoDB, Parse.

Created an online form builder and inline editor using JavaScript, node.js and MongoDB. A simple drag and drop fields to form interface with dual language support, hierarchical questionnaire capability, embeddable form-code creation, integration with google analytics and Optimizely to track responses.
Integrating external applications like email marketing tools, social media sites and integrate with back-end membership or donation systems.
PHP scripts to create interactive analytic dashboards in SiSense Reporting Tool by integrating data from different data sources and platforms.
Server management, maintaining existing MySQL databases, designing new features for existing websites, design and develop databases in MySQL and SQL Server 2008
Interactive front end development, integration with merchants like PayPal and Merchant One. Social media integration with Facebook, Twitter, Meetup APIs.
Designing database triggers and indexing. Designing and generate reports.

volunteer.summary: SOS Children's Villages is an independent, non-governmental, social development organisation that provides family-based care for children in India since 1964. It advocates the concerns, rights and needs of children.
highlights: Awarded 'Student Volunteer of the Year' consecutively for 3yrs.
